<template>
  <el-dialog
    @close="closeDialog"
    :visible.sync="historyVisible"
    :title="$t(title) || (isUplodHistory ? $t('userRole.userList.uploadHistory') : $t('purchaseRequest.exportHistory'))"
  >
    <list-view :dataList="dataList" v-loading="loading || outsideLoading" :config="{ align: 'center' }" :tableSchema="tableSchema">
    </list-view>
    <section v-if="historyVisible" class="pagination-center">
      <el-pagination
        background
        layout="sizes, prev, pager, next"
        :current-page="searchParams.page_no"
        :total.sync="total"
        :page-sizes="[10, 20, 50, 100]"
        :page-size="searchParams.count"
        @size-change="handleSizeChange"
        @current-change="handlePageChange"
      ></el-pagination>
    </section>
  </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import ListView from '@/components/ApproveList/list';
import { getExportHistory, getExportHistoryForFBS, downloadHistoryResult } from '@/api/history';
import { downloadBlobFile } from '@/utils/downloadFile';
import moment from 'moment';
import { ExportTaskTypeMap, getContentType } from '@/utils/constant';

// TODO: è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ç”¨äºŽå¤šç§åœºæ™¯ï¼Œåº”è¯¥æŠŠä¸šåŠ¡ä¾èµ–æŠ½ç¦»
export default {
  name: 'exportHistory',
  components: {
    ListView
  },
  data() {
    return {
      historyVisible: false,
      loading: false,
      total: 0,
      dataList: [],
      searchParams: {
        page_no: 1,
        count: 10
      },
      timeID: null
    };
  },
  props: {
    visible: {
      type: Boolean, // æ˜¯å¦å¯è§
      default: false
    },
    interval: { // è½®è¯¢æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´é—´éš”ï¼Œ0åˆ™ä¸è½®è¯¢
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    taskType: { // å¦‚æžœæ˜¯export éœ€è¦æ‰©å±•è¡¥å……ExportTaskTypeMapå¸¸é‡ï¼Œå’Œfilenameæœ‰å…³
      // type: Number,
      required: true
    },
    isUplodHistory: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    getFileName: { // å¦‚æžœæœ‰åˆ™ä¼˜å…ˆçº§æ›´é«˜ï¼Œå¦åˆ™é‡‡ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼
      type: Function,
      required: false
    },
    source: { // B2Cã€FBS
      type: String,
      default: 'B2C'
    },
    needErrorFile: { // å¦‚æžœ=trueï¼Œåˆ™é€šè¿‡æ˜¯å¦æœ‰result_linkå€¼æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸‹è½½æŒ‰é’®
      default: false,
      type: Boolean
    },
    title: { // å¦‚æžœæœ‰å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼˜å…ˆå–ä¼ å…¥å€¼
      default: ''
    },
    tableSchema: {
      type: Array,
      default() {
        return [
          {
            label: this.isUplodHistory ? this.$t('approvalFlow.uploadTime') : this.$t('purchaseOrder.createTime'),
            field: 'ctime',
            render: (schema, row) => (row.ctime ? moment(row.ctime * 1000).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') : '/')
          },
          {
            label: this.$t(this.isUplodHistory ? 'filename' : 'userRole.userList.username'),
            field: this.isUplodHistory ? 'file_name' : 'operator'
          },
          {
            label: this.$t('userRole.userList.status'),
            field: 'status',
            type: 'enum',
            options: [
              { label: 'waiting', value: 0 }, // å…¼å®¹iscçŠ¶æ€
              { label: 'Processing', value: 1 },
              { label: 'Success', value: 2 },
              { label: 'Fail', value: 3 },
              { label: 'Download', value: 4 }, // å…¼å®¹iscçŠ¶æ€
              { label: 'Partial Success', value: 12 }
            ]
          },
          {
            columnKey: 'action',
            label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.action'),
            width: '180px',
            render: (schema, row) => {
              if (this.needErrorFile) {
                if (!row.result_link) return null;
              } else if (this.isUplodHistory) {
                if (![3, 12].includes(row.status)) return null;
              } else if (row.status !== 2) {
                return null;
              }
              return [
                'el-button',
                {
                  class: 'action-btn',
                  props: { type: 'default', size: 'mini' },
                  on: { click: () => this.downloadResult(row) }
                },
                this.$t('purchaseRequest.download')
              ];
            }
          }
        ];
      }
    },
    isOutsideData: { // æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å¤–æºæ•°æ®
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    outsideData: {
      // å¤–éƒ¨æ•°æ®æºï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    outsideTotal: {
      // å¤–éƒ¨æ•°æ®æºæ€»å…±æ¡æ•°
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    outsideLoading: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    customDownloadAction: { // æ˜¯å¦è‡ªå®šä¹‰downloadäº‹ä»¶
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getHistory(params = {}) {
      if (this.isOutsideData) {
        this.$emit('getHistoryData', this.searchParams);
      } else {
        this.loading = true;
        let func = () => Promise.resolve();
        if (this.source === 'B2C') {
          func = getExportHistory;
        } else {
          func = getExportHistoryForFBS;
        }
        func({ ...params, task_type: this.taskType })
          .then(resp => {
            if (resp.retcode !== 0) {
              this.$message.error(resp.info);
            } else {
              this.dataList = resp.data.task_history_list || [];
              this.total = resp.data.total || 0;
            }
            this.loading = false;
          })
          .catch(() => {
            this.$message.error(`Server error, please retry and report to dev if retry doesn't work.`);
            this.loading = false;
          });
      }
    },
    handleSizeChange(count) {
      this.searchParams.page_no = 1;
      this.searchParams.count = count;
      this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
    },
    handlePageChange(pageIndex) {
      this.searchParams.page_no = pageIndex;
      this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
    },
    closeDialog() {
      this.$emit('close');
    },
    downloadResult(row) {
      if (this.customDownloadAction) { // è‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸‹è½½äº‹ä»¶
        this.$emit('download', row);
        return false;
      }
      downloadHistoryResult({ task_id: row.task_id, result_link: row.result_link })
        .then(resp => {
          if (resp.type === 'application/json') {
            // ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥çš„å‡ºçŽ°é”™è¯¯æç¤º
            const reader = new FileReader();
            reader.onloadend = () => {
              const result = JSON.parse(reader.result);
              if (result.retcode !== 0) {
                this.$message.error(result.info);
              }
            };
            reader.readAsText(resp);
          } else {
            // console.log(resp);
            let fileName = 'result';
            if (typeof this.getFileName === 'function') {
              fileName = this.getFileName(row, resp.type);
            } else if (this.isUplodHistory) {
              fileName = `${row.file_name}_result.${getContentType(resp.type)}`;
            } else if (this.source === 'B2C') {
              fileName = `${ExportTaskTypeMap[this.taskType]}_${moment().format('YYYYMMDDHHmmss')}.${getContentType(resp.type)}`;
            } else {
              fileName = `${this.taskType}_${moment().format('YYYYMMDDHHmmss')}.${getContentType(resp.type)}`;
            }
            downloadBlobFile(resp, fileName);
          }
        })
        .catch(e => {
          this.$message.error('Download Failed');
        });
    }
  },
  watch: {
    '$props.visible': {
      handler(curr, prev) {
        this.historyVisible = curr;
        this.searchParams = {
          page_no: 1,
          count: 10
        };
        if (curr) {
          this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
        }
        if (curr && this.interval) {
          this.timeID = setInterval(() => {
            if (this.dataList.some(item => item.status === 1)) {
              this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
            }
          }, this.interval);
        } else if (!curr && this.interval) {
          clearInterval(this.timeID);
        }
      },
      immediate: true
    },
    outsideData: {
      handler(nv, ov) {
        if (nv) {
          this.dataList = this.outsideData;
          this.total = this.outsideTotal;
        }
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    clearInterval(this.timeID);
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.pagination-center {
  margin-top: 20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}
/deep/ .el-dialog__header {
  text-align: left;
}
</style>

<template>
  <el-dialog @close="closeDialog" :visible.sync="historyVisible" :title="$t('commonUploadHistory')">
    <list-view
      :dataList="dataList"
      v-loading="loading"
      :config="{ align: 'center' }"
      :tableSchema="tableSchema"
    >
    </list-view>
    <section v-if="historyVisible" class="pagination-center">
      <el-pagination background layout="sizes, prev, pager, next" :current-page='searchParams.page_no'
        :total.sync="total" :page-sizes='[10, 20, 50, 100]' :page-size="searchParams.count"
        @size-change='handleSizeChange' @current-change="handlePageChange"></el-pagination>
    </section>
  </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import ListView from '@/components/ApproveList/list';
// import { getExportHistory, downloadHistoryResult } from '@/api/history';
import { uploadLifecycleHistoryMore, downloadHistoryResult } from '@/api/lifecycle';
import { downloadBlobFile } from '@/utils/downloadFile';
import moment from 'moment';
import { ExportTaskTypeMap, showUploadTypeMap, getContentType } from '@/utils/constant';
export default {
  components: {
    ListView
  },
  data() {
    return {
      historyVisible: false,
      loading: false,
      total: 0,
      dataList: [],
      searchParams: {
        page_no: 1,
        count: 10
      },
      timeID: null
    };
  },
  props: {
    visible: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    interval: {
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    taskType: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    },
    tableSchema: {
      type: Array,
      default() {
        return [
          { label: this.$t('purchaseOrder.createTime'), field: 'ctime',
            render: (schema, row) => row.ctime ? moment(row.ctime * 1000).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') : '/'
          },
          { label: this.$t('userRole.userList.username'), field: 'operator' },
          { label: this.$t('Type'), field: 'task_type', type: 'enum',
            options: showUploadTypeMap
          },
          { label: this.$t('userRole.userList.status'), field: 'status', type: 'enum',
            options: [
              { label: 'Processing', value: 1 },
              { label: 'Success', value: 2 },
              { label: 'Fail', value: 3 }
            ]
          },
          { columnKey: 'action',
            label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.action'),
            width: '180px',
            render: (schema, row) => {
              return row.result_link ? [
                'el-button',
                {
                  class: 'action-btn',
                  props: { type: 'default', size: 'mini' },
                  on: { click: () => this.downloadResult(row) }
                },
                this.$t('purchaseRequest.download')
              ] : null;
            }
          }
        ];
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getHistory(params = {}) {
      this.loading = true;
      // getExportHistory({ ...params, task_type: this.taskType }).then(resp => {
      uploadLifecycleHistoryMore({ ...params, task_type_list: this.taskType }).then(resp => {
        if (resp.retcode !== 0) {
          this.$message.error(resp.info);
        } else {
          this.dataList = resp.data.task_history_list || [];
          this.total = resp.data.total || 0;
        }
        this.loading = false;
      }).catch(() => {
        this.$message.error(`Server error, please retry and report to dev if retry doesn't work.`);
        this.loading = false;
      });
    },
    handleSizeChange(count) {
      this.searchParams.page_no = 1;
      this.searchParams.count = count;
      this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
    },
    handlePageChange(pageIndex) {
      this.searchParams.page_no = pageIndex;
      this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
    },
    closeDialog() {
      this.$emit('close');
    },
    downloadResult(row) {
      downloadHistoryResult({ task_id: row.task_id, result_link: row.result_link }).then(resp => {
        if (resp.type === 'application/json') {
          const reader = new FileReader();
          reader.onloadend = () => {
            const result = JSON.parse(reader.result);
            if (result.retcode !== 0) {
              this.$message.error(result.info);
            }
          };
          reader.readAsText(resp);
        } else {
          downloadBlobFile(resp, `${ExportTaskTypeMap[row.task_type]}_${moment().format('YYYYMMDDHHmmss')}.${getContentType(resp.type)}`);
        }
      }).catch((e) => {
        this.$message.error('Download Failed');
      });
    }
  },
  watch: {
    '$props.visible': {
      handler(curr, prev) {
        this.historyVisible = curr;
        this.searchParams = {
          page_no: 1,
          count: 10
        };
        if (curr) {
          this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
        }
        if (curr && this.interval) {
          this.timeID = setInterval(() => {
            if (this.dataList.some(item => item.status === 1)) {
              this.getHistory(this.searchParams);
            }
          }, this.interval);
        } else if (!curr && this.interval) {
          clearInterval(this.timeID);
        }
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    clearInterval(this.timeID);
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
  .pagination-center {
    margin-top: 20px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
  }
</style>

const initPager = {
  total: 0,

};

};
</script>

    @close="closeDialog"
    :visible.sync="historyVisible"
    :title="title"
  >
    <list-view :dataList="dataList" v-loading="loading" :config="tableConfig" :tableSchema="tableSchema">
    </list-view>
    <section v-if="historyVisible" class="pagination-center">
      <el-pagination
        background
        layout="sizes, prev, pager, next"
        :current-page="pager.page_no"
        :total.sync="pager.total"
        :page-sizes="[10, 20, 50, 100]"
        :page-size="pager.count"
        @size-change="handlePageSizeChange"
        @current-change="handlePageNumChange"
      ></el-pagination>
    </section>
  </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import moment from 'moment';
import ListView from '@/components/ApproveList/list';

const initPager = {
  total: 0,
  count: 10,
  page_no: 1
};

export default {
  name: 'exportHistory',
  components: {
    ListView
  },
  data() {
    return {
      historyVisible: false,
      pager: {...initPager},
      loading: false,
      dataList: []
    };
  },
  props: {
    visible: {
      type: Boolean, // æ˜¯å¦å¯è§
      default: false
    },
    title: { // å¦‚æžœæœ‰å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼˜å…ˆå–ä¼ å…¥å€¼
      default: ''
    },
    fetchMethod: {
      type: Function,
      required: true
    },
    tableConfig: {
      default() {
        return { align: 'center', border: false };
      },
      required: false
    },
    taskType: {
      type: Number,
      required: true
    },
    currentRegion: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    tableSchema: {
      type: Array,
      default() {
        return [
          {
            label: this.$t('purchaseOrder.createTime'),
            field: 'ctime',
            render: (schema, row) => (row.ctime ? moment(row.ctime * 1000).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') : '/')
          },
          {
            label: this.$t('userRole.userList.username'),
            field: 'operator'
          },
          {
            label: this.$t('userRole.userList.status'),
            field: 'status',
            type: 'enum',
            options: [
              { label: 'Waiting', value: 0 },
              { label: 'Processing', value: 1 },
              { label: 'Success', value: 2 },
              { label: 'Fail', value: 3 }
            ]
          },
          {
            columnKey: 'action',
            label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.action'),
            width: '180px',
            render: (schema, row) => {
              const { result_link = '' } = row;
              if (!result_link) {
                return null;
              }
              return [
                'el-button',
                {
                  class: 'action-btn',
                  props: { type: 'default', size: 'mini' },
                  on: { click: () => window.open(result_link) }
                },
                this.$t('purchaseRequest.download')
              ];
            }
          }
        ];
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handlePageSizeChange(count) {
      this.pager.count = count;
      this.fetchHistory({ count, page_no: this.pager.page_no, task_type: this.taskType });
    },
    handlePageNumChange(page_no) {
      this.pager.page_no = page_no;
      this.fetchHistory({ page_no, count: this.pager.count, task_type: this.taskType });
    },
    closeDialog() {
      this.$emit('close');
    },
    async fetchHistory(params, headers = { 'X-Region': this.currentRegion }) {
      try {
        const { data: { task_history_list = [], total }, retcode, message } = await this.fetchMethod(params, headers);
        this.dataList = task_history_list || [];
        this.pager.total = total || 0;
        if (retcode !== 0) {
          this.$message.error(`Fetch History ${message}`);
        }
      } catch (e) {
        this.dataList = [];
        this.pager = {...initPager};
        this.$message.error(`Fetch History ${e}`);
      }
    }
  },
  watch: {
    '$props.visible': {
      handler(currVisible, prevVisible) {
        this.historyVisible = currVisible;
        if (currVisible) {
          const { count, page_no } = this.pager;
          this.fetchHistory({ task_type: this.taskType, count, page_no });
        } else {
          this.pager = {...initPager};
        }
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.pagination-center {
  margin-top: 20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}
</style>

<template>
  <section class="product-item-list">
    <el-table @selection-change="onSelectRows" :span-method="itemGroup" class="product-sku-list" border :data="skuList" @filter-change="onFilterChange" ref="table">
      <el-table-column column-key="selection" type="selection" :label-width="`40px`"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :prop="schema.field" :sortable="schema.sortable || false" :width="schema.width || 'auto'" :min-width="schema.minWidth"
        :column-key="schema.columnKey || ''" :align="schema.align || 'center'" :label="schema.label" :filters="schema.filters" :filter-multiple="schema.filterMultiple"
        v-for="schema in tableSchema" :key="schema.field" :fixed="schema.fixed || false">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <pms-table-cell @update="closeUpdate" :forceUpdate="update" :renderData="getTableCellRender(schema, scope.row, scope.$index)"></pms-table-cell>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <el-pagination
      :current-page="SkuPager.pageIndex" background layout="prev, pager, next, jumper" :total.sync="SkuPager.total"
      :page-size="SkuPager.size" @current-change="handleChangePageIndex"
    ></el-pagination>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import PMSTableItem from '@/components/BaseItem/tableItem';
import { NominateStatusList, NominateRejectReasonList, PriceChangeResultList, CheckPointTypeList } from '@/utils/constant';
import { roundPriceByRegion } from '@/utils/format';
import { formatValue } from '@/utils/formatParams';
const ColumnKeyWhiteList = ['selection', 'itemID', 'itemName', 'supplierID', 'shopID', 'limitedSellingQuantities'];
const IsCannelled = 11;
const IsExpired = 5;
const IsComfirmed = 3;
const EditKeys = ['apply_promotion_price', 'apply_contract_price', 'discount', 'limited_selling_quantities', 'remark',
  'gross_margin_check_point', 'limited_selling_quantities_check_point', 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point',
  'promotion_price_check_point', 'promo_stock'];
const CheckPointKeys = ['gross_margin_check_point', 'limited_selling_quantities_check_point', 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point', 'promotion_price_check_point'];

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      skuList: [],
      update: false
    };
  },
  props: {
    region: String,
    itemList: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    mode: {
      type: String,
      default: 'create'
    },
    campaignType: { // 1 product_promotion 2 CFS 3 seller discount 4 orignal price change
      type: Number,
      default: 3
    },
    SkuPager: Object,
    cacheSkuList: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    productsType: {
      type: String,
      default: '1'
    }
  },
  components: {
    'pms-table-cell': PMSTableItem
  },
  computed: {
    currency() {
      return this.$store.getters.currencyMap[this.region];
    },
    tableSchema() {
      return [
        { columnKey: 'itemID', fixed: true, field: 'item_id', label: this.$t('productId'), width: 110, align: 'left' },
        { columnKey: 'itemName', fixed: true, field: 'item_name', label: this.$t('productName'), width: 110, align: 'left' },
        { columnKey: 'supplierID', field: 'supplier_id', label: this.$t('commonVendorSiteID'), width: 110, align: 'left', hidden: this.productsType === '3' },
        { columnKey: 'shopID', field: 'shop_id', label: this.$t('commonShopIDOrName'), width: 160, align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => ['p', {}, `${row.shop_id}/${row.shop_name}`] },
        { columnKey: 'limitedSellingQuantities', field: 'limited_selling_quantities', label: this.$t('limitedSellingQuantities'), width: 120, align: 'right',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.mode === 'detail' ? this.getLimitedSellingQuantities(row) : ['el-input-number', {
            class: 'qty-input-number',
            props: { value: this.getLimitedSellingQuantities(row), min: 0, controls: false, precision: 0, disabled: this.getLimitedSellingQuantitiesDisabledStatus(row) },
            on: {
              input: (value) => this.submitLimitedSellingQuantitiesModify(index, schema.field, value)
            }
          }]
        },
        { columnKey: 'limited_selling_quantities_check_point', field: 'limited_selling_quantities_check_point', label: this.$t('limitedSellingCheckPoint'), align: 'left',
          filters: this.checkPointFilters, filterMultiple: false, width: 140, render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getCheckPointStatus(schema, row, index),
          hidden: this.productsType === '3' },
        { field: 'sku_id', width: '190px', label: this.$t('commonSkuID'), align: 'left' },
        { field: 'variation', label: this.$t('commonVariation'), width: '120px', align: 'left', render: (schema, row) => !row[schema.field] ? '/' : row[schema.field] },
        { field: 'original_price', label: `${this.$t('sellerDiscountOriginalPrice')} (${this.currency})`, align: 'right', render: (schema, row) => formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0), width: 90 },
        { field: 'contract_price', label: `${this.$t('sellerDiscountContractPrice')} (${this.currency})`, align: 'right',
          render: (schema, row) => formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0), width: 90, hidden: this.productsType === '3' },
        { field: 'apply_contract_price', label: `${this.$t('marketingCenter.appliedContractPrice')} (${this.currency})`, width: '120px', align: 'right',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => row.purchase_type === 'Consignment' && this.mode !== 'detail' ? ['el-input-number', {
            class: 'qty-input-number',
            props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], min: 0.01, controls: false, precision: 2, disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
            on: { input: (value) => this.submitModify(index, schema.field, value) }
          }] : (row.purchase_type === 'Outright' && !row[schema.field] ? '/' : formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0)), hidden: this.productsType === '3'
        },
        { field: 'historically_low_selling_price', label: `${this.$t('historicallyLowSellingPrice')} (${this.currency})`, align: 'right',
          render: (schema, row) => row[schema.field] < 0 ? '/' : formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0), width: 140, hidden: this.productsType === '3' },
        { field: 'apply_promotion_price', label: `${this.$t('appliedPromotionPrice', {currency: this.currency})}`,
          minWidth: '130px', align: 'right', numProps: {precision: this.region === 'MY' || this.region === 'SG' ? 2 : 0},
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.mode === 'detail' ? row[schema.field] : ['el-input', {
            class: `qty-input-number ${this.isPriceError(row) ? 'error-input' : ''}`,
            props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], type: 'number', disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
            on: {
              input: (value) => this.onNumberInput(index, schema, value, false),
              change: (value) => this.changePromotionPrice(value, row, index, schema)
            }
          }]
        },
        { field: 'discount', label: this.$t('marketingCenter.discount'), width: 120, align: 'right',
          numProps: {min: 0, max: this.region === 'TW' ? 9.9 : 99, precision: this.region === 'TW' ? 1 : 0},
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.mode === 'detail' ? `${this.region !== 'TW' ? Math.round(row[schema.field]) : row.discount.toFixed(1)} ${this.region === 'TW' ? this.$t('marketingCenter.discountUnit') : '%OFF'}` : ['div', {
            class: `nominate-discount-input-style ${this.isDisountError(row) ? 'error-input' : ''}`
          }, [h('el-input', {
            props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], type: 'number', disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
            on: {
              input: (value) => this.onNumberInput(index, schema, value),
              change: (value) => this.onDiscountChange(value, row, index, schema)
            }
          }), h('span', {}, this.region === 'TW' ? this.$t('marketingCenter.discountUnit') : '%OFF')]]
        },
        {
          field: 'promo_stock', label: this.$t('marketingCenterPromotionStock'), width: '120px', align: 'right', hidden: this.campaignType !== 3,
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.mode === 'detail' ? `${row[schema.field]}` : ['el-input-number', {
            class: 'qty-input-number',
            props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], min: 0, max: 1000000, controls: false, precision: 0, disabled: true }, // äº§å“è¯´ä¸å¯ç¼–è¾‘
            on: {
              input: (value) => this.submitModify(index, schema.field, value)
            }
          }]
        },
        { field: 'apply_gross_margin', label: `${this.$t('marketingCenter.appliedGrossMargin')} (%)`, width: '120px', align: 'right',
          render: (schema, row) => this.getGrossMargin(row), hidden: this.productsType === '3'
        },
        { columnKey: 'gross_margin_check_point', field: 'gross_margin_check_point', label: this.$t('grossMarginCheckPoint'), filters: this.checkPointFilters, width: 140, align: 'left',
          filterMultiple: false, render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getCheckPointStatus(schema, row, index), hidden: this.productsType === '3' },
        { columnKey: 'promotion_price_check_point', field: 'promotion_price_check_point', label: this.$t('promotionPriceCheckPoint'), filters: this.checkPointFilters, width: 140, align: 'left',
          filterMultiple: false, render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getCheckPointStatus(schema, row, index), hidden: this.productsType === '3' },
        { columnKey: 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point', field: 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point',
          label: this.$t('historicallyLowPriceCheckPoint'), filters: this.checkPointFilters, width: 140, align: 'left',
          filterMultiple: false, render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getCheckPointStatus(schema, row, index), hidden: this.productsType === '3' },
        { field: 'remark', width: '120px', label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.remark'), align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row, index) => {
            return ['create', 'edit'].includes(this.mode) ? ['el-input', {
              props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], max: 100, disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
              on: { input: value => this.submitModify(index, schema.field, value) }
            }] : row[schema.field];
          }, hidden: this.productsType === '3'
        },
        { field: 'request_status', label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.status'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', width: 134, align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            if (row.request_status === 1) return row.request_status_text || '';
            const statusItem = NominateStatusList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'process_status', label: this.$t('marketingCenter.priceChangeResult'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', width: 140, align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            const statusItem = PriceChangeResultList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'reject_reason', label: this.$t('supplier.rejectReason'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', width: 120, align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            const statusItem = NominateRejectReasonList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'reject_remark', label: this.$t('marketingCenter.rejectRemark'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', width: 120, align: 'left' },
        { fixed: 'right', columnKey: 'action', field: 'action', label: this.$t('commonAction'), width: '96px', align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            return ['el-button', {
              class: 'danger-text-btn',
              props: { type: 'text'},
              on: { click: () => this.removeSku(row) }
            }, this.$t('purchaseOrder.remove')];
          }, hidden: this.mode !== 'create'
        },
        { fixed: 'right', columnKey: 'action', field: 'action', label: this.$t('commonAction'), width: '150px', align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getActionRender(schema, row, index, h),
          hidden: this.mode !== 'edit'
        }
      ].filter(item => !item.hidden);
    },
    checkPointFilters() {
      return CheckPointTypeList.map(({label, value}) => {
        return {
          text: label,
          value
        };
      });
    }
  },
  watch: {
    itemList: {
      handler(curr) {
        const list = [];
        curr.forEach(item => list.push(...(item.sku_list || []).map((sku, index) => ({
          ...item,
          ...sku,
          apply_contract_price: sku.apply_contract_price === null ? undefined : sku.apply_contract_price || sku.contract_price,
          limited_selling_quantities: sku.limited_selling_quantities || 0,
          is_cancel: sku.is_cancel || false,
          skuIndex: index,
          promo_stock: sku.promo_stock || 0
        }))));
        this.skuList = list;
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onNumberInput(index, schema, value) {
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], schema.field, value);
    },
    onNumberChange(props, value) {
      value = parseFloat(value);
      if (props) {
        const max = props.max;
        const min = props.min;
        const precision = props.precision;
        value = (max && value > max) ? max : value;
        value = (min && value < min) ? min : value;
        value = precision === 0 || precision ? parseFloat(value.toFixed(precision)) : value;
      }
      return value;
    },
    onDiscountChange(value, row, index, schema) {
      value = this.onNumberChange(schema.numProps, value);
      let result = 0;
      if (this.region === 'TW') {
        result = row.original_price * value / 10;
      } else {
        result = row.original_price * (1 - value * 0.01);
      }
      const afterRoundResult = roundPriceByRegion(result, this.region);
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'discount', value);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'discount', value);
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundResult);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundResult);
      this.$emit('nominationRefresh', {value, row, index});
    },
    changePromotionPrice(value, row, index, schema) {
      value = this.onNumberChange(schema.numProps, value);
      const afterRoundPrice = roundPriceByRegion(value, this.region) || 0;
      this.skuList[index].apply_promotion_price = null;
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundPrice);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundPrice);
      if (this.region === 'TW') {
        this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'discount', (parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price) / 10).toFixed(1));
        this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'discount', (parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price) / 10).toFixed(1));
      } else {
        this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'discount', (100 - parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price)));
        this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'discount', (100 - parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price)));
      }
        this.$emit('nominationRefresh', {value, row, index});
    },
    isPriceError(row) {
      return row.apply_promotion_price <= 0 || Number(row.original_price) <= Number(row.apply_promotion_price);
    },
    isDisountError(row) {
      let isError = false;
      if (this.region === 'TW') {
        isError = row.discount > 9.9 || row.discount <= 0;
      } else {
        isError = row.discount > 99 || row.discount <= 0;
      }
      return isError;
    },
    onFilterChange(filters) {
      const params = {};
      Object.entries(filters).forEach(([key, value]) => {
        const filterValue = value.length ? value[0] : '';
        params[key] = filterValue;
        CheckPointKeys.forEach(checkKey => {
          if (checkKey !== key) {
            this.$refs.table.clearFilter(checkKey);
          }
        });
      });
      this.$emit('getFilterItemList', params);
    },
    getActionRender(schema, row, index, h) {
      if (
        (this.campaignType === 3 && (row.request_status === IsExpired || row.request_status === IsCannelled)) ||
        ((this.campaignType === 1 || this.campaignType === 2) && (row.request_status === IsComfirmed || row.request_status === IsExpired || row.request_status === IsCannelled)) ||
        (this.campaignType === 4 && (row.request_status === IsComfirmed || row.request_status === IsCannelled))
      ) {
        return '';
      }
      // orignal price change 4 åªæœ‰cancelæ“ä½œ
      // å…¶ä»–campaignType æ´»åŠ¨åœ¨ å•ç‹¬å‡ºçŽ°ä¸€ä¸ªcancelæ“ä½œ
      if (this.campaignType === 4 || !row.is_cancel) {
        return (['div', {}, [
          h('el-popover', { class: '', attrs: {trigger: 'hover', placement: 'top'}}, [
              h('el-button', { class: 'danger-text-btn', slot: 'reference', props: { type: 'text' }, on: { click: () => this.cancelItem(row, index) }}, this.$t('commonCancel')),
              h('span', {style: 'width: 300px'}, this.$t('sellerDiscountCancelTip'))
            ]
          )
        ]]);
      }
      if (row.is_cancel) {
        return (['div', {}, [
          h('el-button', {
            class: 'primary-text-btn',
            props: { type: 'text' },
            on: { click: () => this.undoItem(row, index) }
          }, this.$t('commonUndo'))
        ]]);
      }
      return (['div', {}, [
        h('el-popover', { class: '', attrs: {trigger: 'hover', placement: 'top'}}, [
            h('el-button', { class: 'danger-text-btn', slot: 'reference', props: { type: 'text' }, on: { click: () => this.cancelItem(row, index) }}, this.$t('commonCancel')),
            h('span', {style: 'width: 300px'}, this.$t('sellerDiscountCancelTip'))
          ]
        )
      ]]);
    },
    getCheckPointStatus(schemam, row, index) {
      return (this.checkPointFilters.find(item => item.value === row[schemam.field]) || { text: '-' }).text;
    },
    closeUpdate() {
      this.update = false;
    },
    itemGroup({ row, column, rowIndex, columnIndex }) {
      if (ColumnKeyWhiteList.includes(column.columnKey)) {
        const group = this.itemList.find(item => item.item_id === row.item_id) || {};
        const groupFirstSku = (group.sku_list || [])[0] || {};
        return row.sku_id === groupFirstSku.sku_id && row.skuIndex === 0 ? [(group.sku_list || []).length, 1] : [0, 0];
      }
    },
    getGroupStatus(row) {
      const group = this.itemList.find(item => item.item_id === row.item_id) || {};
      return !row.is_closed && (group.sku_list || []).filter(sku => !sku.is_closed).length === 1;
    },
    getTableCellRender(schema, row, index) {
      return { schema, row, index };
    },
    getDisabledStatus(row) {
      return row.is_cancel || row.request_status === IsCannelled;
    },
    // seller discount ä¸­ æ¯ä¸€é¡¹sku æ˜¯IsExpired æˆ–è€… IsCannelled åˆ™ä¸å¯ä»¥ç¼–è¾‘
    // åœ¨product promotion ä¸­ å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯confirmedçš„çŠ¶æ€ åˆ™ä¸å¯ç¼–è¾‘
    getLimitedSellingQuantitiesDisabledStatus(row) {
      if (this.campaignType === 1 || this.campaignType === 2) { // product promotion CFS
        return (this.skuList.filter(sku => sku.item_id === row.item_id).some(sku => sku.request_status === IsComfirmed || sku.is_confirmed)) ||
        (this.skuList.filter(sku => sku.item_id === row.item_id).every(sku => sku.request_status === IsExpired || sku.request_status === IsCannelled || sku.is_cancel));
      }
      return this.skuList.filter(sku => sku.item_id === row.item_id).every(sku => sku.request_status === IsExpired || sku.request_status === IsCannelled || sku.is_cancel);
    },
    getLimitedSellingQuantities(row) {
      return (this.skuList.filter(sku => sku.item_id === row.item_id).find(sku => sku.limited_selling_quantities) || {limited_selling_quantities: 0}).limited_selling_quantities;
    },
    getGrossMargin(row) {
      if (!row.apply_contract_price || !row.apply_promotion_price) return `0`;
      return `${(parseFloat((row.apply_promotion_price - row.apply_contract_price) / row.apply_promotion_price) * 100).toFixed(1)} %`;
    },
    onSelectRows(rows) {
      const list = [];
      const itemMap = {};
      rows.forEach(row => {
        if (!itemMap[row.item_id]) {
          itemMap[row.item_id] = true;
          row.sku_list.forEach(sku => {
            const index = this.skuList.findIndex(item => item.sku_id === sku.sku_id && item.item_id === row.item_id);
            if (index !== -1) list.push(this.skuList[index]);
          });
        }
      });
      this.$emit('selectRows', list);
    },
    removeItem(row) {
      this.$emit('removeItem', row.item_id);
    },
    removeSku(row) {
      this.$emit('removeSku', row);
    },
    cancelItem(row, index) {
      const cacheSku = this.cacheSkuList.find(sku => sku.sku_id === row.sku_id && row.request_status === sku.request_status);
      EditKeys.forEach(key => {
        if (key !== 'limited_selling_quantities') { // limited_selling_quantities ä¸éœ€è¦é‡ç½®
          this.skuList[index][key] = cacheSku ? cacheSku[key] : this.skuList[index][key];
          this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], key, cacheSku ? cacheSku[key] : this.skuList[index][key]);
        }
      });
      this.skuList[index]['is_cancel'] = true;
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'is_cancel', true);
    },
    undoItem(row, index) {
      const field = 'is_cancel';
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], field, false);
      row.is_cancel = false;
    },
    submitLimitedSellingQuantitiesModify(index, field, value) {
      const item_id = this.skuList[index]['item_id'];
      this.skuList.forEach((sku, index) => {
        if (sku.item_id === item_id && sku.request_status !== IsCannelled && sku.request_status !== IsExpired) {
          this.submitModify(index, 'limited_selling_quantities', value);
        }
      });
    },
    submitModify(index, field, value) {
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], field, value);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], field, value);
    },
    handleChangePageIndex(index) {
      this.$emit('getItemList', index);
    }
  }
};
</script>

source:
<template>
  <section class="product-item-list">
    <el-table @selection-change="onSelectRows" :span-method="itemGroup" class="product-sku-list" border :data="skuList" @filter-change="onFilterChange" ref="table">
      <el-table-column column-key="selection" type="selection" :label-width="`40px`"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :prop="schema.field" :sortable="schema.sortable || false" :width="schema.width || 'auto'"
        :column-key="schema.columnKey || ''" :align="schema.align || 'center'" :label="schema.label" :filters="schema.filters" :filter-multiple="schema.filterMultiple"
        v-for="schema in tableSchema" :key="schema.field" :fixed="schema.fixed || false">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <pms-table-cell @update="closeUpdate" :forceUpdate="update" :renderData="getTableCellRender(schema, scope.row, scope.$index)"></pms-table-cell>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <el-pagination
      v-if="mode === 'create'"
      :current-page="SkuPager.pageIndex" background layout="prev, pager, next, jumper" :total.sync="SkuPager.total"
      :page-size="SkuPager.size" @current-change="handleChangePageIndex"
    ></el-pagination>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import PMSTableItem from '@/components/BaseItem/tableItem';
import { NominateStatusList, NominateRejectReasonList, PriceChangeResultList } from '@/utils/constant';
import { formatValue } from '@/utils/formatParams';
const ColumnKeyWhiteList = ['selection', 'itemID', 'itemName'];
const IsCannelled = 11;
const IsComfirmed = 3;
const EditKeys = ['apply_original_price', 'apply_contract_price', 'remark'];
const CheckPointKeys = ['gross_margin_check_point', 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point', 'original_price_check_point'];

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      skuList: [],
      update: false,
      checkPointFilters: [
        { text: 'Pass', value: 1 },
        { text: 'Fail', value: 2 },
        { text: 'No Setup', value: 3 }
      ]
    };
  },
  props: {
    region: String,
    itemList: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    mode: {
      type: String,
      default: 'create'
    },
    SkuPager: Object,
    cacheSkuList: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    }
  },
  components: {
    'pms-table-cell': PMSTableItem
  },
  computed: {
    currency() {
      return this.$store.getters.currencyMap[this.region];
    },
    tableSchema() {
      return [
        { columnKey: 'itemID', fixed: true, field: 'item_id', label: this.$t('supplier.productID'), width: 90 },
        { columnKey: 'itemName', fixed: true, field: 'item_name', label: this.$t('supplier.productName'), width: 110 },
        { columnKey: 'supplierID', field: 'supplier_id', label: this.$t('backMargin.vendorSiteID'), width: 120 },
        { columnKey: 'shopID', field: 'shop_id', label: this.$t('commonShopIDOrName'), width: 200, align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => ['p', {}, `${row.shop_id}/${row.shop_name}`] }, // TODO add shop_name
        { field: 'sku_id', width: '120px', label: this.$t('commonSkuID')},
        { field: 'variation', label: this.$t('commonVariation'), width: '120px', align: 'left', render: (schema, row) => !row[schema.field] ? '/' : row[schema.field] },
        { field: 'original_price', width: '90px', label: `${this.$t('marketingCenter.originalPrice')} (${this.currency})`, render: (schema, row) => formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0) },
        { field: 'contract_price', width: '90px', label: `${this.$t('marketingCenter.contractPrice')} (${this.currency})`, render: (schema, row) => formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0) },
        { field: 'apply_contract_price', label: `${this.$t('marketingCenter.appliedContractPrice')} (${this.currency})`, width: '120px',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => row.purchase_type === 'Consignment' && this.mode !== 'detail' ? ['el-input-number', {
            class: 'qty-input-number',
            key: `${this.skuList[index]['sku_id']}_${schema.field}`, // è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ–°å¢žkeyæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†æ›´æ–°dom
            props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], min: 0.01, controls: false, precision: 2, disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
            on: { input: (value) => this.submitModify(index, schema.field, value) }
          }] : (row.purchase_type === 'Outright' && !row[schema.field] ? '/' : formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0))
        },
        { field: 'historically_low_selling_price', width: '140px', label: `${this.$t('historicallyLowSellingPrice')} (${this.currency})`,
          render: (schema, row) => row[schema.field] < 0 ? '/' : formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0) },
        { field: 'apply_original_price', label: `${this.$t('marketingCenter.appliedOriginalPrice')} (${this.currency})`, width: '120px',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.mode === 'detail' ? formatValue(row[schema.field] || 0) : ['el-input-number', {
            class: 'qty-input-number',
            key: `${this.skuList[index]['sku_id']}_${schema.field}`, // è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ–°å¢žkeyæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†æ›´æ–°dom
            props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], min: 1, controls: false, precision: 0, disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
            on: { input: (value) => this.submitModify(index, schema.field, value) }
          }]
        },
        { field: 'apply_gross_margin', label: `${this.$t('marketingCenter.appliedGrossMargin')} (%)`, width: '120px',
          render: (schema, row) => this.getGrossMargin(row)
        },
        { columnKey: 'gross_margin_check_point', field: 'gross_margin_check_point', label: this.$t('grossMarginCheckPoint'), filters: this.checkPointFilters, width: 120,
          filterMultiple: false, render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getCheckPointStatus(schema, row, index) },
        { columnKey: 'original_price_check_point', field: 'original_price_check_point', label: this.$t('originalPriceCheckPoint'), filters: this.checkPointFilters, width: 120,
          filterMultiple: false, render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getCheckPointStatus(schema, row, index) },
        { columnKey: 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point', field: 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point', label: this.$t('historicallyLowPriceCheckPoint'), filters: this.checkPointFilters, width: 140,
          filterMultiple: false, render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getCheckPointStatus(schema, row, index) },
        { field: 'remark', width: '120px', label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.remark'),
          render: (schema, row, index) => {
            return ['create', 'edit'].includes(this.mode) ? ['el-input', {
              props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], max: 100, disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
              on: { input: value => this.submitModify(index, schema.field, value) }
            }] : row[schema.field];
          }
        },
        { field: 'request_status', width: 134, label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.status'), hidden: this.mode === 'create',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            if (row.request_status === 1) return row.request_status_text || '';
            const statusItem = NominateStatusList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'process_status', width: 140, label: this.$t('marketingCenter.priceChangeResult'), hidden: this.mode === 'create',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            const statusItem = PriceChangeResultList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'reject_reason', width: 120, label: this.$t('supplier.rejectReason'), hidden: this.mode === 'create',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            const statusItem = NominateRejectReasonList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'reject_remark', width: 120, label: this.$t('marketingCenter.rejectRemark'), hidden: this.mode === 'create' },
        { fixed: 'right', columnKey: 'action', field: 'action', label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.action'), width: '96px',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            return ['el-button', {
              class: 'danger-text-btn',
              props: { type: 'text' },
              on: { click: () => this.removeSku(row) }
            }, this.$t('purchaseOrder.remove')];
          }, hidden: this.mode !== 'create'
        },
        { fixed: 'right', columnKey: 'action', field: 'action', label: this.$t('commonAction'), width: '96px',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getActionRender(schema, row, index, h),
          hidden: this.mode !== 'edit'
        }
      ].filter(item => !item.hidden);
    }
  },
  watch: {
    itemList: {
      handler(curr) {
        const list = [];
        curr.forEach(item => list.push(...(item.sku_list || []).map((sku, index) => ({
          ...item,
          ...sku,
          apply_original_price: sku.apply_original_price === undefined ? sku.original_price : sku.apply_original_price,
          apply_contract_price: sku.apply_contract_price === undefined ? sku.contract_price : (sku.apply_contract_price === null ? undefined : sku.apply_contract_price),
          is_cancel: sku.is_cancel || false,
          skuIndex: index
        }))));
        this.skuList = list;
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onFilterChange(filters) {
      const params = {};
      Object.entries(filters).forEach(([key, value]) => {
        const filterValue = value.length ? value[0] : '';
        params[key] = filterValue;
        CheckPointKeys.forEach(checkKey => {
          if (checkKey !== key) {
            this.$refs.table.clearFilter(checkKey);
          }
        });
      });
      this.$emit('getFilterItemList', params);
    },
    getCheckPointStatus(schemam, row, index) {
      return (this.checkPointFilters.find(item => item.value === row[schemam.field]) || { text: '/' }).text;
    },
    getActionRender(schema, row, index, h) {
      if (row.request_status === IsComfirmed || row.request_status === IsCannelled) {
        return '';
      }
      // orignal price change 4  request_status: Pending Approval,Pending Confirmation,Rejected æœ‰cancelæ“ä½œ
      if (row.is_cancel) {
        return (['div', {}, [
          h('el-button', {
            class: 'primary-text-btn',
            props: { type: 'text' },
            on: { click: () => this.undoItem(row, index) }
          }, this.$t('commonUndo'))
        ]]);
      }
      return (['div', {}, [
        h('el-popover', { class: '', attrs: {trigger: 'hover', placement: 'top'}}, [
            h('el-button', { class: 'danger-text-btn', slot: 'reference', props: { type: 'text' }, on: { click: () => this.cancelItem(row, index) }}, this.$t('commonCancel')),
            h('span', {style: 'width: 300px'}, this.$t('sellerDiscountCancelTip'))
          ]
        )
      ]]);
    },
    closeUpdate() {
      this.update = false;
    },
    itemGroup({ row, column, rowIndex, columnIndex }) {
      if (ColumnKeyWhiteList.includes(column.columnKey)) {
        const group = this.itemList.find(item => item.item_id === row.item_id) || {};
        const groupFirstSku = (group.sku_list || [])[0] || {};
        return row.sku_id === groupFirstSku.sku_id && row.skuIndex === 0 ? [(group.sku_list || []).length, 1] : [0, 0];
      }
    },
    getGroupStatus(row) {
      const group = this.itemList.find(item => item.item_id === row.item_id) || {};
      return !row.is_closed && (group.sku_list || []).filter(sku => !sku.is_closed).length === 1;
    },
    getTableCellRender(schema, row, index) {
      return { schema, row, index };
    },
    getDisabledStatus(row) {
      return row.is_cancel || row.request_status === IsCannelled || row.request_status === IsComfirmed;
    },
    getGrossMargin(row) {
      if (!row.apply_contract_price || !row.apply_original_price) return `0`;
      return `${(parseFloat((row.apply_original_price - row.apply_contract_price) / row.apply_original_price) * 100).toFixed(1)} %`;
    },
    onSelectRows(rows) {
      const list = [];
      const itemMap = {};
      rows.forEach(row => {
        if (!itemMap[row.item_id]) {
          itemMap[row.item_id] = true;
          row.sku_list.forEach(sku => {
            const index = this.skuList.findIndex(item => item.sku_id === sku.sku_id && item.item_id === row.item_id);
            if (index !== -1) list.push(this.skuList[index]);
          });
        }
      });
      this.$emit('selectRows', list);
    },
    removeItem(row) {
      this.$emit('removeItem', row.item_id);
    },
    removeSku(row) {
      this.$emit('removeSku', row);
    },
    cancelItem(row, index) {
      const cacheSku = this.cacheSkuList.find(sku => sku.sku_id === row.sku_id && row.request_status === sku.request_status);
      EditKeys.forEach(key => {
        this.skuList[index][key] = cacheSku ? cacheSku[key] : this.skuList[index][key];
      });
      this.skuList[index]['is_cancel'] = true;
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'is_cancel', true);
    },
    undoItem(row, index) {
      const field = 'is_cancel';
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], field, false);
      row.is_cancel = false;
    },
    submitModify(index, field, value) {
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], field, value);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], field, value);
    },
    handleChangePageIndex(index) {
      this.$emit('getItemList', index);
    }
  }
};
</script>

    .el-table__body-wrapper {
      position: static;
    }
    .input-cell {
      display: flex;
      width: 100%;
      align-items: center;
      .cell-value {
        flex: 1;
        text-align: right;
      }
      .cell-unit {
        width: 40px;
        padding-left: 4px;
        text-align: left;
      }
    }
    .primary-text-btn {
      color: #3d6ed1;
      margin-right: 8px;
    }
    .danger-text-btn {

<script>
import PMSTableItem from '@/components/BaseItem/tableItem';
import { NominateStatusList, BlackStockRejectReasonList, PriceChangeResultList, CheckPointTypeList} from '@/utils/constant';
import { formatValue } from '@/utils/formatParams';
import { roundPriceByRegion } from '@/utils/format';
const ColumnKeyWhiteList = ['selection', 'itemID', 'itemName', 'supplierID', 'shopID', 'limitedSellingQuantities'];
const IsCannelled = 11;
const IsExpired = 5;
const EditKeys = ['apply_promotion_price', 'apply_contract_price', 'discount', 'limited_selling_quantities', 'remark', 'gross_margin_check_point', 'limited_selling_quantities_check_point', 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point', 'promotion_price_check_point'];
const CheckPointKeys = ['gross_margin_check_point', 'limited_selling_quantities_check_point', 'historically_low_selling_price_check_point', 'promotion_price_check_point'];
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      skuList: [],
      update: true
    };
  },
  props: {
    region: String,
    itemList: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    mode: {
      type: String,
      default: 'create'
    },
    campaignType: { // 1 product_promotion 2 CFS 3 seller discount 4 orignal price change 5ã€black Stock
      type: Number,
      default: 5
    },
    SkuPager: Object,
    cacheSkuList: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []

        { field: 'apply_promotion_price', label: `${this.$t('appliedPromotionPrice', {currency: this.currency})}`,

        { field: 'discount', label: this.$t('marketingCenter.discount'), width: 120, align: 'right',
          numProps: {min: 0, max: this.region === 'TW' ? 9.9 : 99, precision: this.region === 'TW' ? 1 : 0},
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.mode === 'detail' ? `${this.region !== 'TW' ? Math.round(row[schema.field]) : row.discount.toFixed(1)} ${this.region === 'TW' ? this.$t('marketingCenter.discountUnit') : '%OFF'}` : ['div', {
            class: `nominate-discount-input-style ${this.isDisountError(row) ? 'error-input' : ''}`
          }, [h('el-input', {
            props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], type: 'number', disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
            on: {
              input: (value) => this.onNumberInput(index, schema, value),
              change: (value) => this.onDiscountChange(value, row, index, schema)
            }
          }), h('span', {}, this.region === 'TW' ? this.$t('marketingCenter.discountUnit') : '%OFF')]]
        },
        { field: 'remark', minWidth: '120px', label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.remark'), align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row, index) => {
            return ['create', 'edit'].includes(this.mode) ? ['el-input', {
              props: { value: this.skuList[index][schema.field], max: 100, disabled: this.getDisabledStatus(row) },
              on: { input: value => this.submitModify(index, schema.field, value) }
            }] : row[schema.field];
          }, hidden: this.productsType === '3'
        },
        { field: 'request_status', label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.status'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', minWidth: 134, align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            if (row.request_status === 1) return row.request_status_text || '';
            const statusItem = NominateStatusList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'process_status', label: this.$t('marketingCenter.priceChangeResult'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', minWidth: 140, align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            const statusItem = PriceChangeResultList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'reject_reason', label: this.$t('supplier.rejectReason'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', width: 120, minWidth: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            const statusItem = BlackStockRejectReasonList.find(item => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
            return statusItem.label || '';
          }
        },
        { field: 'reject_remark', label: this.$t('marketingCenter.rejectRemark'), hidden: this.mode !== 'detail' || this.productsType === '3', minWidth: 120, align: 'left' },
        { fixed: 'right', columnKey: 'action', field: 'action', label: this.$t('commonAction'), width: '96px', align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            return ['el-button', {
              class: 'danger-text-btn',
              props: { type: 'text'},
              on: { click: () => this.removeSku(row) }
            }, this.$t('purchaseOrder.remove')];
          }, hidden: this.mode !== 'create'
        },
        { fixed: 'right', columnKey: 'action', field: 'action', label: this.$t('commonAction'), width: '150px', align: 'left',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => this.getActionRender(schema, row, index, h),
          hidden: this.mode !== 'edit'
        }
      ].filter(item => !item.hidden);
    },
    checkPointFilters() {
      return CheckPointTypeList.map(({label, value}) => {
        return {
          text: label,
          value
        };
      });
    }
  },
  watch: {
    itemList: {
      handler(curr) {
        const list = [];
        curr.forEach(item => list.push(...(item.sku_list || []).map((sku, index) => ({
          ...item,
          ...sku,
          apply_contract_price: sku.apply_contract_price === null ? undefined : sku.apply_contract_price || sku.contract_price,
          limited_selling_quantities: sku.limited_selling_quantities || 0,
          is_cancel: sku.is_cancel || false,
          skuIndex: index
        }))));
        this.skuList = list;
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    isPriceError(row) {
      return row.apply_promotion_price <= 0 || Number(row.original_price) <= Number(row.apply_promotion_price);
    },
    isDisountError(row) {
      let isError = false;
      if (this.region === 'TW') {
        isError = row.discount > 9.9 || row.discount <= 0;
      } else {
        isError = row.discount > 99 || row.discount <= 0;
      }
      return isError;
    },
    onNumberInput(index, schema, value) {
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], schema.field, value);
    },
    onNumberChange(props, value) {
      value = parseFloat(value);
      if (props) {
        const max = props.max;
        const min = props.min;
        const precision = props.precision;
        value = (max && value > max) ? max : value;
        value = (min && value < min) ? min : value;
        value = precision === 0 || precision ? parseFloat(value.toFixed(precision)) : value;
      }
      return value;
    },
    onDiscountChange(value, row, index, schema) {
      value = this.onNumberChange(schema.numProps, value);
      let result = 0;
      if (this.region === 'TW') {
        result = row.original_price * value / 10;
      } else {
        result = row.original_price * (1 - value * 0.01);
      }
      const afterRoundResult = roundPriceByRegion(result, this.region);
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'discount', value);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'discount', value);
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundResult);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundResult);
      this.$emit('nominationRefresh', {value, row, index});
    },
    changePromotionPrice(value, row, index, schema) {
      value = this.onNumberChange(schema.numProps, value);
      const afterRoundPrice = roundPriceByRegion(value, this.region) || 0;
      this.skuList[index].apply_promotion_price = null;
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundPrice);
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'apply_promotion_price', afterRoundPrice);
      if (this.region === 'TW') {
        this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'discount', (parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price) / 10).toFixed(1));
        this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'discount', (parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price) / 10).toFixed(1));
      } else {
        this.$set(this.skuList[index], 'discount', (100 - parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price)));
        this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'discount', (100 - parseInt(afterRoundPrice * 100 / row.original_price)));
      }
        this.$emit('nominationRefresh', {value, row, index});
    },
    onFilterChange(filters) {
      const params = {};
      Object.entries(filters).forEach(([key, value]) => {
        const filterValue = value.length ? value[0] : '';
        params[key] = filterValue;
        CheckPointKeys.forEach(checkKey => {
          if (checkKey !== key) {
            this.$refs.table.clearFilter(checkKey);
          }
        });
      });
      this.$emit('getFilterItemList', params);
    },
    getActionRender(schema, row, index, h) {
      if (!row.is_cancel) {
        return (['div', {}, [
          h('el-popover', { class: '', attrs: {trigger: 'hover', placement: 'top'}}, [
              h('el-button', { class: 'danger-text-btn', slot: 'reference', props: { type: 'text' }, on: { click: () => this.cancelItem(row, index) }}, this.$t('commonCancel')),
              h('span', {style: 'width: 300px'}, this.$t('sellerDiscountCancelTip'))
            ]
          )
        ]]);
      }
      if (row.is_cancel) {
        return (['div', {}, [
          h('el-button', {
            class: 'primary-text-btn',
            props: { type: 'text' },
            on: { click: () => this.undoItem(row, index) }
          }, this.$t('commonUndo'))
        ]]);
      }
      return (['div', {}, [
        h('el-popover', { class: '', attrs: {trigger: 'hover', placement: 'top'}}, [
            h('el-button', { class: 'danger-text-btn', slot: 'reference', props: { type: 'text' }, on: { click: () => this.cancelItem(row, index) }}, this.$t('commonCancel')),
            h('span', {style: 'width: 300px'}, this.$t('sellerDiscountCancelTip'))
          ]
        )
      ]]);
    },
    getCheckPointStatus(schemam, row, index) {
      return (this.checkPointFilters.find(item => item.value === row[schemam.field]) || { text: '-' }).text;
    },
    closeUpdate() {
      this.update = false;
    },
    itemGroup({ row, column, rowIndex, columnIndex }) {
      if (ColumnKeyWhiteList.includes(column.columnKey)) {
        const group = this.itemList.find(item => item.item_id === row.item_id) || {};
        const groupFirstSku = (group.sku_list || [])[0] || {};
        return row.sku_id === groupFirstSku.sku_id && row.skuIndex === 0 ? [(group.sku_list || []).length, 1] : [0, 0];
      }
    },
    getGroupStatus(row) {
      const group = this.itemList.find(item => item.item_id === row.item_id) || {};
      return !row.is_closed && (group.sku_list || []).filter(sku => !sku.is_closed).length === 1;
    },
    getTableCellRender(schema, row, index) {
      return { schema, row, index };
    },
    getDisabledStatus(row) {
      return row.is_cancel || row.request_status === IsCannelled || (row.process_status === 4 && row.request_status === 3);
    },
    getLimitedSellingQuantities(row) {
      return (this.skuList.filter(sku => sku.item_id === row.item_id).find(sku => sku.limited_selling_quantities) || {limited_selling_quantities: 0}).limited_selling_quantities;
    },
    getGrossMargin(row) {
      if (!row.apply_contract_price || !row.apply_promotion_price) return `0`;
      return `${(parseFloat((row.apply_promotion_price - row.apply_contract_price) / row.apply_promotion_price) * 100).toFixed(1)} %`;
    },
    onSelectRows(rows) {
      const list = [];
      const itemMap = {};
      rows.forEach(row => {
        if (!itemMap[row.item_id]) {
          itemMap[row.item_id] = true;
          row.sku_list.forEach(sku => {
            const index = this.skuList.findIndex(item => item.sku_id === sku.sku_id && item.item_id === row.item_id);
            if (index !== -1) list.push(this.skuList[index]);
          });
        }
      });
      this.$emit('selectRows', list);
    },
    removeItem(row) {
      this.$emit('removeItem', row.item_id);
    },
    removeSku(row) {
      this.$emit('removeSku', row);
    },
    cancelItem(row, index) {
      const cacheSku = this.cacheSkuList.find(sku => sku.sku_id === row.sku_id && row.request_status === sku.request_status);
      EditKeys.forEach(key => {
        if (key !== 'limited_selling_quantities') { // limited_selling_quantities ä¸éœ€è¦é‡ç½®
          this.skuList[index][key] = cacheSku ? cacheSku[key] : this.skuList[index][key];
          this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], key, cacheSku ? cacheSku[key] : this.skuList[index][key]);
        }
      });
      this.skuList[index]['is_cancel'] = true;
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], 'is_cancel', true);
    },
    undoItem(row, index) {
      const field = 'is_cancel';
      this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], field, false);
      row.is_cancel = false;
    },
    submitLimitedSellingQuantitiesModify(index, field, value) {
      const item_id = this.skuList[index]['item_id'];
      this.skuList.forEach((sku, index) => {
        if (sku.item_id === item_id && sku.request_status !== IsCannelled && sku.request_status !== IsExpired) {
          this.submitModify(index, 'limited_selling_quantities', value);
        }
      });
    },
    submitModify(index, field, value, isUpdate = true) {
      this.$set(this.skuList[index], field, value);
      if (isUpdate) { this.$emit('modifySku', this.skuList[index], field, value); }
    },
    handleChangePageIndex(index) {
      this.$emit('getItemList', index);
    }
  }
};
</script>

<template>
  <el-dialog
    :visible.sync="dialogVisible"
    width="500px"
    lock-scroll
    custom-class="pms-dialog pms-ui pms-ele-ui"
    :title="$t(config.title)"
    @close="onClose"
  >
    <section class="order-log">
      <el-form :model="form" label-width="110px" ref="form" label-position="left">
        <el-form-item
          :label="$t(config.label) + ': '"
          prop="text"
          :rules="{ required: config.required, message:config.message, trigger: 'blur'}"
        >
          <el-input type="textarea" v-model="form.text" :maxlength="config.maxLength || ''"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-form>
    </section>
    <section slot="footer">
      <el-button class="list-btn white-blue" @click="onClose">{{$t('commonCancel')}}</el-button>
      <el-button class="list-btn" @click="onConfirm">{{$t('commonConfirm')}}</el-button>
    </section>
  </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      dialogVisible: false,
      form: {
        text: ''
      }
    };
  },
  props: {
    config: {
      type: Object,
      default: {
        actionType: 'reject',
        title: 'commonReject',
        label: 'commonRejectReason',
        maxLength: 128,
        required: true,
        message: 'Reject Reason is Required!'
      }
    },
    visible: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: true,
      default: false
    }
  },
  watch: {
    visible: {
      handler(value) {
        this.dialogVisible = value;
        if (value) {
          this.form.text = '';
        }
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onClose() {
      this.$emit('close');
    },
    onConfirm() {
      this.$refs.form.validate(pass => {
        if (pass) {
          this.$emit('confirm', this.form.text, this.config.actionType);
          this.onClose();
        }
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>
