<template>
  <section class='pms-ui'>
    <PRList @showExportHistory="showExportHistory" :tableSchema="tableSchema" :createHidden=true :activeTab="activeTab" :searchSchema='searchSchema' merchantType="ALL">
      <template slot="header">
        <el-tabs tab-position='bottom' style='height:60px;' v-model="activeTab">
          <el-tab-pane v-if='showPOList' :label="$t('route.purchaseOrderList')" name="poList"></el-tab-pane>
        </el-tabs>
      </template>
    </PRList>
    <check-inbound-dialog :visible="showCheckInbound" :orderID="orderID" @close="closeCheckInbound"></check-inbound-dialog>
    <export-history-dialog :interval="15000" :taskType="taskType" :visible="showExportHistoryDialog" @close="closeExportHistory"></export-history-dialog>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import { setPurchaseOrderStatus } from '@/api/purchaseOrder';
import PRList from '@/components/ApproveList';
import { hasPermission } from '@/utils/permission';
import { Permission, ReturnCodeMap, PurchaseOrderStatus, IRUnderReservationList } from '@/utils/constant';
import { formatValue } from '@/utils/formatParams';
import CheckInboundDialog from '@/components/ApproveList/checkInboundDialog';
import ExportHistoryDialog from '@/components/ApproveList/exportHistoryDialog';
import { getSellerPageUrl } from '@/views/FBS/sellerAndShop/utils';

export default {
  name: 'pendingGeneratePO',
  data() {
    return {
      activeTab: '',
      showPOList: false,
      orderID: '',
      showCheckInbound: false,
      showExportHistoryDialog: false,
      tabList: [
        { field: 'showPOList', value: 'poList' }
      ]
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.showPOList = hasPermission(Permission.PO_LIST);
    this.canCheckInbound = true;
    this.canCancelPO = hasPermission(Permission.EDIT_PO);
    const activeTab = `${this.$route.query.activeTab}`;
    this.tabList.some(item => {
      if (this[item.field]) {
        const tabOption = this.tabList.find(tab => tab.value.includes(activeTab));
        if (tabOption && this[tabOption.field]) {
          this.activeTab = tabOption.value;
        } else if (tabOption) {
          this.$message.error('You do not have permission to view this page, please contact the system administrator to add permissions');
          this.$router.replace('/admin/dashboard');
        } else {
          this.activeTab = item.value;
        }
        return true;
      }
    });
  },
  methods: {
    formatValue,
    formatUnderReservation(value) {
      return (IRUnderReservationList.find(item => item.value === value) || { label: '/'}).label;
    },
    linkSupplier(row) {
      if (row.merchant_type === 'SELLER') {
        const path = getSellerPageUrl('detail', { id: row.sbs_vendor_id});
        this.$router.push(path);
      } else {
        this.$router.push({ path: `/admin/supplier/list/detail/${row.supplierID}` });
      }
    },
    getCurrency(warehouse) {
      return this.currencyMap[warehouse];
    },
    closeExportHistory() {
      this.showExportHistoryDialog = false;
    },
    showExportHistory() {
      this.showExportHistoryDialog = true;
    },
    closeCheckInbound() {
      this.orderID = '';
      this.showCheckInbound = false;
    },
    cancelPO(row, index) {
      this.$confirm(this.$t('purchaseOrder.confirmCancelPO'), this.$t('purchaseOrder.warn'), {
        confirmButtonText: this.$t('purchaseOrder.Confirm'),
        cancelButtonText: this.$t('purchaseOrder.cancel')
      }).then(() => {
        this.changePOStatus(row, 4);
      }).catch(() => {});
    },
    addASN(row) {
      window.open(`/admin/purchase/order/podetail/${row.orderID}?create=1`);
    },
    checkInboundPO(row, index) {
      this.orderID = row.orderID;
      this.showCheckInbound = true;
    },
    changePOStatus(row, status, confirmed = false) {
      const params = { order_id: row.orderID, last_status: row.status, new_status: status, double_confirm: confirmed };
      setPurchaseOrderStatus(params).then(resp => {
        if (resp.retcode === ReturnCodeMap.OUTSTANDING_ASN_WARNING) {
          this.$alert(resp.info, 'Warning', {
            confirmButtonText: 'Close'
          });
        } else if (resp.retcode === ReturnCodeMap.SKU_SALES_ORDER_WARNING) {
          const h = this.$createElement;
          const skuList = (resp.info && resp.info.error) || [];
          this.$msgbox({
            title: '',
            center: true,
            customClass: 'pms-warning-message-box',
            message: h('div', { class: 'message-box-warning pms-ui' }, [
              h('section', { class: 'warning-title' }, 'Warning!'),
              h('section', { class: 'warning-info' }, [
                h('i', { class: 'el-icon-warning warning-info-icon' }),
                h('div', {}, [
                  h('span', `Please note that following skus already have sales orders,
                  fulfilment of which might be impacted by this PO ${status === 4 ? 'cancellation' : 'closure'}!`),
                  h('i', { class: 'el-icon-download info-download-icon' }),
                  h('a', { on: { click: () => window.open(`/api/purchase_orders/${row.orderID}/pre_order_export/`) }}, 'Reserved SKUs'),
                  h('span', ' (click this link and get reserved sku list)')
                ])
              ]),
              h('el-table', { class: 'reserved-sku', props: {
                border: true, data: skuList.length > 3 ? [...skuList.slice(0, 3), { sku_id: '...', unit_reserved: '...' }] : skuList
              }}, [
                h('el-table-column', {
                  props: { label: 'SKU ID', prop: 'sku_id' }
                }),
                h('el-table-column', {
                  props: { label: 'Units reserved by sales orders', prop: 'unit_reserved' }
                })
              ])
            ]),
            showCancelButton: true,
            confirmButtonText: 'Confirm',
            cancelButtonText: 'Cancel'
          }).then(() => {
            this.changePOStatus(row, status, true);
          }).catch(() => {});
        } else if (resp.retcode !== 0) {
          this.$message.error(resp.info);
        } else {
          row.status = status;
          row.statusText = this.statusList[status].label;
        }
      });
    },
    closePO(row, index) {
      this.$confirm('', this.$t('purchaseOrder.warnBtnCloseContent'), {
        confirmButtonText: this.$t('purchaseOrder.Confirm'),
        cancelButtonText: this.$t('purchaseOrder.cancelPoClose')
      }).then(() => { this.changePOStatus(row, 5); }).catch(() => {});
    }
  },
  computed: {
    currencyMap() {
      return this.$store.getters.currencyMap;
    },
    searchSchema() {
      if (this.activeTab === 'poList') {
        return ['ctime', 'region', 'orderID', 'supplierName', 'expected_inbound_date', 'purchaseType', 'requestID', 'supplierID',
          { field: 'sbsVendorId', offset: 9 },
          'prCreatedBy',
          { field: 'createdBy', label: 'purchaseOrder.poProcessor' },
          { field: 'orderType', offset: 9 },
          'status',
          'backlogDuration',
          { field: 'CBNominationType', offset: 9 },
          { field: 'supplierType', offset: 9 },
          'under_reservation'
        ];
      }
    },
    statusList() {
      const arr = this.activeTab === 'poList' ? PurchaseOrderStatus : [];
      return [{ value: '', label: 'All' }, ...arr];
    },
    taskType() {
      return this.activeTab === 'poList' ? 7 : 6;
    },
    tableSchema() {
      return [
        { label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.requestID'), field: 'requestID' },
        { label: this.$t('purchaseOrder.orderID'), field: 'orderID', hidden: this.activeTab !== 'poList' },
        { label: this.$t('IBRUnderReservation'), field: 'under_reservation',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            return `${this.formatUnderReservation(row.under_reservation)}`;
          }
        },
        { label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.region'), field: 'country' },
        { label: this.$t('purchaseOrder.warehouse'), field: 'warehouse' },
        { label: this.$t('commonVendorName'), field: 'supplierName' },
        {
          label: `${this.$t('commonSBSVendorID')} / ${this.$t('commonVendorSiteID')}`,
          field: 'supplierID',
          columnKey: 'action',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            return [
              'div',
              {
                class: 'supplier-id',
                on: { click: () => this.linkSupplier(row) }
              },
              `${row.sbs_vendor_id}/${row[schema.field]}`
            ];
          }
        },
        { label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.purchaseType'), field: 'purchaseType' },
        {
          label: this.activeTab === 'poList' ? this.$t('purchaseOrder.totalValue') : this.$t('purchaseRequest.preApprovalValue'),
          field: 'totalValue',
          sortable: 'custom',
          render: (schema, row) => `${this.formatValue(row[schema.field])} ${this.getCurrency(row.warehouse)}`
        },
        {
          label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.postApprovalValue'),
          field: 'hasApproval',
          hidden: this.activeTab === 'poList',
          sortable: 'custom',
          render: (schema, row) => {
            if (row[schema.field]) {
              return `${this.formatValue(row.lastApprovalTotalValue)} ${this.getCurrency(row.warehouse)}`;
            } else {
              return '\\';
            }
          }
        },
        { label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.status'), field: 'statusText' },
        { label: this.activeTab === 'poList' ? this.$t('purchaseRequest.prRequester') : this.$t('purchaseRequest.requester'), field: 'createdBy' },
        { label: this.$t('purchaseOrder.createTime'), field: 'createdDate' },
        {
          hidden: this.activeTab !== 'poList',
          columnKey: 'action',
          label: this.$t('purchaseRequest.action'),
          width: '180px',
          render: (schema, row, index, h) => {
            return [
              'div',
              { class: 'po-action' },
              [
                {
                  hidden: row.status !== 1 || !this.canCancelPO,
                  render: ['el-button', {
                    class: 'action-btn',
                    props: { type: 'danger', size: 'mini' },
                    on: { click: () => this.cancelPO(row, index) }
                  }, this.$t('purchaseOrder.cancel')]
                },
                {
                  hidden: !row.can_add,
                  render: ['el-button', {
                    class: 'action-btn',
                    props: { type: 'primary', size: 'mini' },
                    on: { click: () => this.addASN(row) }
                  }, this.$t('purchaseOrder.createASN')]
                },
                {
                  hidden: !([2, 3, 5].includes(row.status)) || !this.canCheckInbound,
                  render: ['el-button', {
                    class: 'action-btn',
                    props: { type: 'primary', size: 'mini' },
                    on: { click: () => this.checkInboundPO(row, index) }
                  }, this.$t('purchaseOrder.checkInboundOrder')]
                },
                {
                  hidden: row.status !== 2 || !this.canCancelPO,
                  render: ['el-button', {
                    class: 'action-btn',
                    props: { type: 'primary', size: 'mini' },
                    on: { click: () => this.closePO(row, index) }
                  }, this.$t('purchaseOrder.Close')]
                }
              ].filter(item => !item.hidden).map(item => h(...item.render))
            ];
          }
        }
      ].filter(item => !item.hidden);
    }
  },
  components: {
    PRList,
    CheckInboundDialog,
    ExportHistoryDialog
  }
};
</script>

<template>
  <el-dialog
    :visible.sync="dialogVisible"
    width="500px"
    lock-scroll
    custom-class="pms-new-ui pms-dialog"
    :title="this.$t('commonConformToRejectIt')"
    @close="onClose"
  >
    <el-form :model="form" label-width="120px" ref="form">
      <el-form-item :label="$t('commonRejectReason')" prop="rejectReason" :rules="{ message: 'Reject reason is required', trigger: 'blur', required: true }" message="">
        <el-input type="textarea" v-model="form.rejectReason" :maxlength="100" show-word-limit ></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
    <section slot="footer">
      <el-button class="white-blue" @click="onClose">{{ $t('commonCancel') }}</el-button>
      <el-button @click="onConfirm">{{ $t('commonConfirm') }}</el-button>
    </section>
  </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>

export default {
  props: {
    visible: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: true,
      default: false
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      form: {
        rejectReason: ''
      },
      dialogVisible: false
    };
  },
  watch: {
    visible: {
      handler(value) {
        this.dialogVisible = value;
      },
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onClose() {
      this.$emit('close');
    },
    onConfirm() {
      this.$refs.form.validate((isPass) => {
        if (isPass) {
          this.$emit('confirm', this.form.rejectReason);
        }
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>

<template>
  <el-checkbox-group :value="selectedRows" @input="selectionChange">
    <el-table
      class="list-container"
      :max-height="config.maxHeight"
      :span-method="config.spanMethod || undefined"
      :sort-by="config.sortBy || ''"
      border
      @sort-change="sortChange"
      @row-click="rowClick"
      :data="dataList || []"
      :row-key="config.rowKey"
      ref="table"
    >
      <el-table-column column-key="action" width="100px" align="center" label-class-name="pms-ele-ui select-all-table-column">
        <template slot="header" slot-scope="scope">
          <el-dropdown
            split-button
            :key="formatCheckedType"
            @click="resetCheckedType"
            placement="bottom"
            trigger="click"
            class="select-page-dropdown"
            @command="changeSelectPageType"
          >
            {{formatCheckedType}}
            <el-dropdown-menu class="options-field-menu" slot="dropdown">
              <el-dropdown-item command="CURRENT">{{$t('commonCurrentPage')}}</el-dropdown-item>
              <el-dropdown-item command="ALL">{{$t('commonAllPage')}}</el-dropdown-item>
            </el-dropdown-menu>
          </el-dropdown>
        </template>
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-checkbox :disabled="checkedType === 'ALL'" :label="scope.row">{{''}}</el-checkbox>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <slot name="checkColumn"></slot>
      <el-table-column
        :prop="schema.field"
        :sortable="schema.sortable || false"
        :width="schema.width || 'auto'"
        :column-key="schema.columnKey || ''"
        :align="schema.align || config.align || 'center'"
        :label="schema.label"
        v-for="schema in tableSchema"
        :key="schema.field"
        :sort-by="schema.sortBy || ''"
        :fixed="schema.fixed"
      >
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <pms-table-cell :renderData="getTableCellRender(schema, scope.row, scope.$index)"></pms-table-cell>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <slot name="end"></slot>
      <slot name="displayOptions"></slot>
    </el-table>
  </el-checkbox-group>
</template>

<script>
import {noop} from 'lodash';

const PMSTableCell = {
  props: {
    renderData: {
      required: true
    }
  },
  render(h) {
    const { schema, row, index } = this.$props.renderData;
    if (typeof schema.render === 'function') {
      const data = schema.render(schema, row, index, h);
      const renderElement = Array.isArray(data) ? data : ['span', data];
      return h(...renderElement);
    } else if (schema.type === 'enum') {
      const options = schema.options || [];
      const option =
        options.find((item) => item.value === row[schema.field]) || {};
      return h('span', option.label || '');
    } else {
      return h('span', row[schema.field]);
    }
  }
};
export default {
  props: {
    dataList: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    },
    tableSchema: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    },
    config: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({})
    },
    checkedType: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    changeSelectPageType: {
      type: Function,
      default: noop
    },
    resetCheckedType: {
      type: Function,
      default: noop
    },
    selectedRows: {
      type: Array,
      default: []
    }
  },
  components: {
    'pms-table-cell': PMSTableCell
  },
  methods: {
    getTableCellRender(schema, row, index) {
      return { schema, row, index };
    },
    sortChange(row, column) {
      this.$emit('sortChange', row, column);
    },
    rowClick(row, column, event) {
      this.$emit('rowClick', row, column, event);
    },
    selectionChange(selection) {
      this.$emit('selectionChange', selection);
    }
  },
  computed: {
    formatCheckedType() {
      return this.checkedType === 'ALL' ? this.$t('commonAllPage') : this.$t('commonCurrentPage');
    }
  }
};
</script>
